ygData.subject: RE: Hey this sounded interesting..
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I d have to question the wisdom of your actions them.  The first thing I would ve done since you weren t successful at getting a bind in Highpass, is run
ygData.messageBody:
On Fri, 1 Oct 1999, Blair, Keith (Keith Blair) wrote:
>
> > I really think your connection speed is playing a huge factor
> > in this. How the h*ll does a bard die 4 times in one night
> > passing through outdoor zones?
>
> You've obviously never met Chief Goonda and tried to recover
> your corpse from his "range of aggrivation". If you read my
> example closely, you'll note that only the first pass was my
> "run through the zone". The others were me trying to recover

I'd have to question the wisdom of your actions them. The
first thing I would've done since you weren't successful at
getting a bind in Highpass, is run to Qeynos and request a
bind there. Yam it up with a sob story about being killed by
Chief Goonda while bound in Freeport. I'd have to say 3 of
your Freeport->Karana runs were self-inflicted.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
